EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name:default=Health IT Pros}}: Win a LEGO Batman Tumbler | National Health IT Week is Sept. 15-19
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-mary-washington-healthcare?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=nhitweek&utm_content=091214> Happy Health IT Week 2014 <http://www.healthitweek.org/> {{lead.First Name:default=}}:
We love IT Pros. We especially love Healthcare IT Pros. This week marks the Ninth Annual National Health IT Week - a collaborative forum and virtual awareness week that assembles key healthcare constituents dedicated to working together to elevate the necessity of advancing health through the best use of information technology.
We invite you to watch an on-demand recording of VMTurbo's recent webinar with Mary Washington Healthcare <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-mary-washington-healthcare?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=nhitweek&utm_content=091214>. Every Health IT Pro who does will be entered to win this bad boy <http://shop.lego.com/en-US/The-Tumbler-76023>.
- Team Turbo Watch to Win <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-mary-washington-healthcare?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=nhitweek&utm_content=091214> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
